title: Permanent Bans
body: Why the fuck is permanent ban a thing? People use time and money into this fucken game, and riot bans them like its nothing? Literally League is going downhill and they still wanna keep this shit up? Motherfckers gotta change this shit and allow people to talk shit. Thats why theres a fucken mute button, if people dont wanna hear it then just fucken mute am i right? Fucken Riot dumbass
